text: Ops, wrong name, too many mentees ahah apologies Heather! :)

I really like your work!! Amazing! I can see that you’re very strong with matte paintings and realistic images. I think that is what I would enlighten more, and I feel like we could work more on character designs

I know it’s not your area of interest but I think you can achieve great results. To improve on characters I would suggest you to do an exercise:  start painting from a photographic reference  as a study ( portrait) then making a caricature of it. In this way you’re basically adding a comedy/ irony to your subject, and pushing shapes. After that, you take the same caricature and start developing a cartoony character pushing shapes even more and simplifying the shapes even more! At this point you have a character for animation with personality cause you started from a reference, and of course you can add details. As final thing you can try to make a turn around
